verses.verse: Now Korach <S%H7141><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of K'hat <S%H6955><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and On <S%H203><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth <S%H6431><s%>, sons <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> men:

And they rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, with certain <S%H582><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the assembly <S%H5712><s%>, famous <S%H7148><s%> in the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, men <S%H582><s%> of renown <S%H8034><s%>:

And they gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and against Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Ye take too much <S%H7227><s%> upon you, seeing all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> are holy <S%H6918><s%>, every one of them, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> them: wherefore then lift ye up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8691><s%> yourselves above the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?
And when Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, he fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%>:

And he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Korach <S%H7141><s%> and unto all his company <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Havahn to morrow <S%H1242><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> will shew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> who are his, and who is holy <S%H6918><s%>; and will cause him to come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto him: even him whom he hath chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> will he cause to come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto him.
This do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you censers <S%H4289><s%>, Korach <S%H7141><s%>, and all his company <S%H5712><s%>;

And put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein <S%H2004><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in them before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> to morrow <S%H4279><s%>: and it shall be that the man <S%H376><s%> whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> doth choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>: ye take too much <S%H7227><s%> upon you, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Korach <S%H7141><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>:

Seemeth it but a small thing <S%H4592><s%> unto you, that the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> hath separated <S%H914><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, to bring you near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to himself to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and to stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto them?

And he hath brought thee near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to him, and all thy brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> with thee: and seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> ye the Kohenhood <S%H3550><s%> also?

For which cause <S%H3651><s%> both thou and all thy company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8737><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and what is Aharon <S%H175><s%>, that ye murmur <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against him?

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>: which said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We will not come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

Is it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast brought us up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, to kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> us in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, except thou make <S%H8323><s%> thyself altogether <S%H8323><s%> <S%H8692><s%> a prince <S%H8323><s%> <S%H8691><s%> over us?

Moreover <S%H637><s%> thou hast not brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> us into a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, or given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards <S%H3754><s%>: wilt thou put out <S%H5365><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%>? we will not come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> wroth <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, Respect <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thou their offering <S%H4503><s%>: I have not taken <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> from them, neither have I hurt <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8689><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of them.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Korach <S%H7141><s%>, Be thou and all thy company <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, thou, and they, and Aharon <S%H175><s%>, to morrow <S%H4279><s%>:

And take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in them, and bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> ye before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%>; thou also, and Aharon <S%H175><s%>, each <S%H376><s%> of you his censer <S%H4289><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them, and laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> with Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%>.

And Korach <S%H7141><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against them unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Separate <S%H914><s%> <S%H8734><s%> yourselves from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them in a moment <S%H7281><s%>.

And they fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, shall one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and wilt thou be wroth <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> ?
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Get you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8734><s%> from about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korach <S%H7141><s%>, Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>; and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> followed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him <S%H310><s%>.

And he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, from the tents <S%H168><s%> of these wicked <S%H7563><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and touch <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> nothing of theirs, lest ye be consumed <S%H5595><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in all their sins <S%H2403><s%>.

So they gat up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korach <S%H7141><s%>, Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, on every side <S%H5439><s%>: and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and stood <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of their tents <S%H168><s%>, and their wives <S%H802><s%>, and their sons <S%H1121><s%>, and their little children <S%H2945><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hereby ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all these works <S%H4639><s%>; for I have not done them of mine own mind <S%H3820><s%>.

If these men die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the common death <S%H4194><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>, or if they be visited <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8735><s%> after the visitation <S%H6486><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>; then the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath not sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me.

But if the YY <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a new thing <S%H1278><s%>, and the earth <S%H127><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallow them up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, with all that appertain unto them, and they go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> quick <S%H2416><s%> into the pit <S%H7585><s%>; then ye shall understand <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that these men <S%H582><s%> have provoked <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass, as he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, that the ground <S%H127><s%> clave asunder <S%H1234><s%> <S%H8735><s%> that was under them:

And the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and their houses <S%H1004><s%>, and all the men <S%H120><s%> that appertained unto Korach <S%H7141><s%>, and all their goods <S%H7399><s%>.

They, and all that appertained to them, went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> into the pit <S%H7585><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon them: and they perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%>.

And all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at the cry <S%H6963><s%> of them: for they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Lest the earth <S%H776><s%> swallow us up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also.

And there came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, that he take up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the censers <S%H4289><s%> out <S%H996><s%> of the burning <S%H8316><s%>, and scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou the fire <S%H784><s%> yonder <S%H1973><s%>; for they are hallowed <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

The censers <S%H4289><s%> of these sinners <S%H2400><s%> against their own souls <S%H5315><s%>, let them make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them broad <S%H7555><s%> plates <S%H6341><s%> for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>: for they offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, therefore they are hallowed <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the brasen <S%H5178><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%>, wherewith they that were burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8803><s%> had offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; and they were made broad <S%H7554><s%> <S%H8762><s%> plates for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

To be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that <S%H834><s%> <S%H4616><s%> no stranger <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, which is not of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to offer <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8687><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; that he be not as Korach <S%H7141><s%>, and as his company <S%H5712><s%>: as the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to him by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

But on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and against Aharon <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Ye have killed <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and against Aharon <S%H175><s%>, that they looked <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> toward the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and, behold, the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Get you up <S%H7426><s%> <S%H8734><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them as in a moment <S%H7281><s%>. And they fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein from off <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> on incense <S%H7004><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8685><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8761><s%> for them: for there is wrath <S%H7110><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%>; the plague <S%H5063><s%> is begun <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation <S%H6951><s%>; and, behold, the plague <S%H5063><s%> was begun <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8689><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>: and he put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on incense <S%H7004><s%>, and made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>.
And he stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> between the dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> and the living <S%H2416><s%>; and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Now they that died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> in the plague <S%H4046><s%> were fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, beside them that died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> about the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Korach <S%H7141><s%>.
